amendment.description: An amendment numbered 50 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funding for the FTC to enforce section 5 of the FTC Act in a manner that is inconsistent with the Sherman Act and the Clayton Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzgerald amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
